summary:
Drawing upon my 13 years of industrial experience in design innovation and 13 years of academic experience in design research,

■ I help UX managers explore their options in UX innovation to strengthen their sense of direction.

■ I help innovation leads prototype first of a kind user interfaces to turn ideas into experientiable and testable artefacts.

■ I help lead designers improve user experiences by reviewing user interfaces according to state-of-the-art interaction design theories.

■ I help design thinkers organise inspiring co-creation workshops which empower participants to turn fluffy ideas into solid concepts and experience prototypes.

■ I help UX leads experiment with creative forms of user research that deliver new insights into user needs, behaviours and values.

■ I help company strategists transform trends written in scientific, clinical jargon into evocative, first person stories that stakeholders can identify with by applying storytelling techniques (e.g. creative writing, bodystorming and video prototyping).	

■ I help universities with guest lectures, student coaching and feedback on their design research and education programmes.

■ Portfolio & CV: www.designdrone.nl

volunteer_experiences.role: Layout and photography for monthly school newsletter
volunteer_experiences.description:
I do the layout of and photography for the monthly newsletter of the Kathedrale Koorschool Utrecht. In cooperation with a teacher and a text editor, I take the month's news items and combine them with photographs I take of school events into a simple yet inviting layout.

Comments from parents:
"Congratulations on the newly designed newsletter! It looks very good and the content is exceptionally clear and informative. Bravo!"
"Clear information. Very attractive layout. My compliments!"
"It looks so gorgeous! A huge compliment for all of you."
